note:
Heyo!We're a queer, autistic DID system! We collectively go by Lunar/Salad/Falafel and we're collectively genderqueer and aromantic asexual (heavy on the aro).

We're bodily 16, so please don't be weird! Also our system is minor heavy (aka, most alters ARE minors) so being weird is like doubly not okay or smth /lhj

Our main interests are LMK, TMNT, Welcome Home, ACNH, and Sims4!

We use tonetags and we're new to the site (Twitter's rebrand pushed us over the edge lmao)

Feel free to say hi!
